description: Candy Box 2 is a text-based browser RPG that features beautiful ASCII art

20250326-1.description:
This is the first alpha release for Candy Box 2.

Includes randomization for quests, enchantments, key items and enemy drops. 
Basic logic on quest requirements
Universal Tracker support for quest entrance randomization

Tested on AP 0.6.0 (RC3), YMMV on later versions

Game client available at: https://candybox2-ap.vicr123.com/20250326-1/

20250331-1.description:
This version of the Candy Box 2 randomizer introduces the following features:

- You can now customize the starting weapon
- You can choose whether the HP Bar should be randomized
- The default options are now more fair for syncs
- Updated German translation for AP integration

Additionally, this version fixes a bug regarding version redirection.

Tested on AP 0.6.0 (RC3), YMMV on later versions

Game client available at: https://candybox2-ap.vicr123.com/20250331-1/

20250409-1.description:
This version of the Candy Box 2 randomizer introduces the following features:

- In quests, the message log is updated to reflect the checks that will be sent if you successfully complete the quest.
- EnergyLink support has been added - you can convert candies and lollipops to energy and share them with other games. You can also convert energy back into candies and lollipops.
- Gifting support has been added - you can send and receive potions to and from other games.
- You can opt to back your save up to the Archipelago server. This is useful if you are switching browsers, or giving your slot to someone else, who will be able to resume the game from where you left off.

Additionally, the following bugs were fixed:
- In some cases, even when you don't have the "none" weapon, the game would forcibly assign you the "none" weapon.
- Chocolate bars were not completely tracked correctly - after erasing a game, you could re-spend chocolate bars that you had already spent.
- The extra "Connecting to Archipelago..." text has been removed.
- Support for Universal Tracker did not correctly track options.

Tested on AP 0.6.1, YMMV on later versions. Requires AP 0.6.0 or later.

Game client available at: https://candybox2-ap.vicr123.com/20250409-1/

20250426-1.description:
This version of the Candy Box 2 randomizer introduces the following features:
- Randomization can now be applied to any room in the game, either separately or together with quests.
- You have the option to use Progressive Weapons instead of selecting a starting weapon. You will start with nothing, and for every Progressive Weapon, you will unlock the next weapon in the list.
- You have the option to use Progressive Jump instead of receiving the Pogo Stock, Desert Bird Feather and the Rocket Boots separately. You will be granted these items in that order every time you are sent a Progressive Jump.
- The notification system for Archipelago updates has been improved
- Hints now contain information about the room that they are in and the entrance that takes you to that room
- An option has been added allowing you to brew multiple X potions
- An option has been added allowing you to disable the computer after you finish a game
- Hints are now created once you first discover either the Village Shop or the Sorceress' Hut
- If text is too long to fit on one line, it will now scroll in most cases.

The following logic changes have been made:
- The Unicorn Horn is now required to obtain the Purple Fin
- The Castle Entrance is now possible with just the Pogo Stick and the Rocket Boots
- Items have been given new classifications that more closely match the meaning of the classification in respect to the items

Additionally, the following bugs were fixed:
- The Dig spot now updates when you send its check
- In some cases, you could softlock yourself if you spend lollipops in the cauldron before you plant them
- The Status Bar now more reliably highlights the current room that you are in
- After throwing in a chocolate bar, if you were left with 0 chocolates and left the wishing well, you would not be able to enchant the next time you returned.

Known issues in this release:
- The dragon on the world map can be unlocked prematurely and take you to a room you should not yet have access to.
- The lighthouse on the world map can be unlocked prematurely and take you to a room you should not yet have access to.

Tested on AP 0.6.1, YMMV on later versions. Requires AP 0.6.0 or later.

Game client available at: https://candybox2-ap.vicr123.com/20250426-1/

20250428-1.description:
This version of the Candy Box 2 randomizer is a bugfix update that fixes the following bugs:
- The apworld did not play nice with some other apworlds (including The Wind Waker and TUNIC)
- In some cases, using a slot name with punctuation characters could cause you not to be able to gift to that slot

The client is backwards compatible with apworlds generated with version 20250426-1.

Known issues in this release:
- The dragon on the world map can be unlocked prematurely and take you to a room you should not yet have access to.
- The lighthouse on the world map can be unlocked prematurely and take you to a room you should not yet have access to.

Tested on AP 0.6.1, YMMV on later versions. Requires AP 0.6.0 or later.

Game client available at: https://candybox2-ap.vicr123.com/20250428-1/

20250430-1.description:
This version of the Candy Box 2 randomizer is a bugfix update that fixes the following bugs:
- The dragon on the world map could be unlocked prematurely and take you to a room you should not yet have access to.
- The lighthouse on the world map could be unlocked prematurely and take you to a room you should not yet have access to.
- Entrance Randomisation would incorrectly fail generation if it was to put the Lollipop Farm behind the X Potion click.
- Logic has been changed in the generation in order to make it less likely that generation will fail.

The client is backwards compatible with apworlds generated with version 20250428-1 (and apworlds compatible with that version)

Tested on AP 0.6.1, YMMV on later versions. Requires AP 0.6.0 or later.

Game client available at: https://candybox2-ap.vicr123.com/20250430-1/

20250524-1.description:
This version of the Candy Box 2 randomizer introduces the following features:
- Progressive Grimoires have been implemented. You can choose to obtain the Beginner's Grimoire, Advanced Grimoire and the Black Magic Grimoire, in that order.
- Individual spells have been implemented. You can choose to obtain each spell separately, resulting in a total of 7 items in the pool. Obtaining the grimoires will send the relevant number of checks.
- An ingame tracker is now available, allowing you to keep an eye of which checks are in logic, and also where specific rooms are.
- Candy drops in quests and candy rewards from Super RPG and Galactic Wars can now be configured with a multiplier option.
- You can now choose the number of Pains au Chocolat to include in the item pool.
- Hint scouting can be turned off if you don't want to create hints when entering a shop.
- The Wishing Well now sends hints once the available items to send are revealed.
- A Save Management screen has been implemented, allowing you to delete old saves without joining the world if needed.
- The EnergyLink exchange rate has been changed. Previously, 1 cal = 1000 J. Now, 1 cal = 4184 J.

The following logic changes have been made:
- The Xinopherydon quest can now be completed if you can brew an anti-gravity potion.
- The Desert Fortress Key can now be obtained from the Hole if you can brew an anti-gravity potion.

Additionally, the following bugs were fixed:
- When the option for brewing multiple X potions is on, you can now brew just one X potion.
- You can now quit prematurely from the Cellar quest.
- The Green Fin, Pitchfork and Shell Powder now apply correctly to the Lollipop Farm if the current vanilla generation rate is < 1 lollipop/sec
- Gifting no longer attempts to send gifts to closed gift boxes.
- Entrance Randomisation for The Hole on the map now works correctly.
- The Sorceress' Hut Inconspicuous Lollipop no longer gives you an extra lollipop when sending the check.
- The squirrel no longer mentions "multiworld" when asking for the candiest person.
- Clearing the X Potion quest no longer also clears the Desert quest.
- The chest in the Ledge room now tells you which item you will send.

Tested on AP 0.6.1, YMMV on later versions. Requires AP 0.6.0 or later.

Game client available at: https://candybox2-ap.vicr123.com/20250524-1/

20250525-1.description:
This version of the Candy Box 2 randomizer is a bugfix update that fixes the following bugs:
- The problem where generation considers some locations not to be reachable has been resolved
- Saving the game on Safari now works properly

The client is backwards compatible with apworlds generated with version 20250524-1

Tested on AP 0.6.1, YMMV on later versions. Requires AP 0.6.0 or later.

Game client available at: https://candybox2-ap.vicr123.com/20250525-1/

20250806-1.description:
This version of the Candy Box 2 randomizer introduces the following features:
- The Font Trap has been implemented. When you receive the Font Trap, the font of the game will change for 60 seconds.
- Support for Archipelago aliases have been added. Wherever a slot name is displayed, the alias will also be displayed, if there is one.
- Candy Box 2 now supports URL connection parameters, in the same format as "Jigsaw Puzzle for Archipelago"
- You can now choose to lock The Tower and The X Potion in their vanilla locations, whilst randomising other entrances as usual.
- The Tracker now tells you how many locations you have checked out of the number of possible locations
- Translations for French, Portuguese (Brazil), German and Spanish have been updated
- The Candy Box 2 apworld now supports being launched from the Archipelago Room directly, as long as the Archipelago application and Candy Box 2 apworld are correctly installed.

The following logic changes have been made:
- When extra checks are required (for example, if you turn on the Font Trap) new checks appear in the Lollipop Farm. These checks are cleared by planting a specific number of lollipops.

Additionally, the following bugs were fixed:
- In some cases, when receiving a gift that had to be refunded, Candy Box 2 would fail to refund the gift, locking out usage of the post office
- "The Hole" in the tracker has been disambiguated
- The shop no longer draws text on top of the purchase button, making it impossible to click
- When you receive an item while you are on the Inventory screen, the inventory now updates to show you the item that was received, if applicable.
- When you kill yourself, the Deathlink message that is sent out now correctly references this
- When not randomising entrances completely, the tracker now tracks entrances correctly.
- In some cases, electing to start the game with a specific weapon rather than using Progressive Weapons would cause logic to route you incorrectly.

Tested on AP 0.6.2, YMMV on later versions. Requires AP 0.6.0 or later.

Game client available at: https://candybox2-ap.vicr123.com/20250806-1/

20250831-1.description:
This version of the Candy Box 2 randomizer is a bugfix update that fixes the following bugs:
- Logic for the Forge items were incorrect and could result in a game that was not able to be completed.

Additionally, the French translation was updated.

Tested on AP 0.6.2, YMMV on later versions. Requires AP 0.6.0 or later.

Game client available at: https://candybox2-ap.vicr123.com/20250831-1/

20250912-1.description:
This version of the Candy Box 2 randomizer is a bugfix update that fixes the following bugs:
- In some cases, being gifted an item could cause the game to fail connecting to Archipelago
- In some cases, when ER places the Egg Room behind the entrance to the Cellar quest, the Egg room would not be able to be cleared

The client is backwards compatible with apworlds generated with version 20250831-1

Tested on AP 0.6.2, YMMV on later versions. Requires AP 0.6.0 or later.

Game client available at: https://candybox2-ap.vicr123.com/20250912-1/

20250923-1.description:
This version of the Candy Box 2 randomizer introduces the following features:
- The Cyclops now tells you what item was sent once you solve the puzzle
- Room names are now ordered alphabetically in the tracker

The following logic changes have been made:
- The Wooden Sword is no longer required to clear the Cellar
- Clearing the Xinopehrydon and the Unicorn Horn now requires that you can jump with the Desert Bird Feather or the Rocket Boots.

Additionally, the following bugs were fixed:
- In some cases, sending multiple enchantments consecutively would not work correctly

Tested on AP 0.6.2, YMMV on later versions. Requires AP 0.6.0 or later.

Game client available at: https://candybox2-ap.vicr123.com/20250923-1/

20251006-1.description:
This version of the Candy Box 2 randomizer introduces the following features:
- A new dialogue system has been implemented.
  - In shops (and some other places) dialogue can be customised for items from any game.
  - To facilitate community submission of dialogue, a new option to open the Dialogue Editor has been added to the login screen.
  - See the Guide in the Dialogue Editor and the Candy Box 2 channel on the Archipelago Discord server for more information.
- The tracker is now resizable
- In the Energy room, you can now act on items by the ten thousands, and you can also deposit all candies or lollipops with one button.

Additionally, the following bugs were fixed:
- In some cases, unexpectedly disconnecting from Archipelago would cause a "Waiting for Archipelago" interstitial to appear and cover the reload button
- The reload button on the "Lost connection to Archipelago" interstitial is now coloured correctly in dark mode

The client is backwards compatible with apworlds generated with version 20250923-1

Tested on AP 0.6.2, YMMV on later versions. Requires AP 0.6.0 or later.

Game client available at: https://candybox2-ap.vicr123.com/20251006-1/

20251022-1.description:
This version of the Candy Box 2 randomizer introduces the following features:
- The apworld now includes an Archipelago Manifest, which will be required for compatibility with Archipelago 0.7.0 and later
- When attempting to connect to an incompatible world, the version redirection system will now automatically redirect and log you into the correct version, without user intervention required.

Additionally, the following bugs were fixed:
- Logic for the HP Bar Unlock has been fixed to indicate that it is available from the beginning of the game
- Some generation failures related to Entrance Randomisation have been resolved, ensuring generation failures occur less often.

Tested on AP 0.6.4 RC1, YMMV on later versions. Requires AP 0.6.0 or later.

Game client available at: https://candybox2-ap.vicr123.com/20251022-1/

20251023-1.description:
This version of the Candy Box 2 randomizer changes the following features:
- Gifts are now sent with the "Potion" trait

The client is backwards compatible with apworlds generated with version 20251022-1

Tested on AP 0.6.4 RC1, YMMV on later versions. Requires AP 0.6.0 or later.

Game client available at: https://candybox2-ap.vicr123.com/20251023-1/

20251208-1.description:
This version of the Candy Box 2 randomizer introduces the following features:
- You can now automatically back up your game to Archipelago every 10 minutes.
  - This feature is enabled by default when you start a new game.
- The eggs in the Egg Room now break unless you have nothing equipped

Additionally, the following bugs were fixed:
- Locking the X Potion Quest from Entrance Randomisation now works correctly
- Clicking the link to open the game from the Archipelago lobby no longer takes you to the blueprint version of the game
- In some cases, turning off the the Invert Colors checkbox in the configuration would not take effect until the game was reloaded
- In some cases, when corrupt data exists, the Save Management page would not load properly

Tested on AP 0.6.4 (RC1), YMMV on later versions. Requires AP 0.6.0 or later.

Game client available at: https://candybox2-ap.vicr123.com/20251208-1/

20260115-1.description:
Happy New Year! This version of the Candy Box 2 randomizer introduces the following features:
- The tracker now indicates when you are in go mode.
- Chocolate bars are no longer tied to your Archipelago progress, and are instead tracked in the save file.

Additionally, the following bugs were fixed:
- The egg room has been tweaked to make the changes in the previous release less drastic.
- Messages sent to the console when a player reaches their goal are now sent in the in-game text client
- The game no longer attempts to contact Archipelago when loading a room without any items to send. Previously, this could cause a "Waiting for Archipelago..." screen to appear unnecessarily.

Tested on AP 0.6.5, YMMV on later versions. Requires AP 0.6.0 or later.

Game client available at: https://candybox2-ap.vicr123.com/20260115-1/

20260210-1.description:
This version of the Candy Box 2 randomizer introduces the following features:
- Item groups are now implemented for the following:
  - Chocolate Bars
  - Lollipops
  - Candies

Additionally, the following bugs were fixed:
- When bad dialogue data is downloaded from the server, the game no longer fails to connect to Archipelago
- A mitigation has been put in place to prevent a problem in Firefox where accessing save files would cause the game to hang (thanks, @Eijebong for helping with the debugging!)

The client is backwards compatible with apworlds generated with version 20260115-1

Tested on AP 0.6.5, YMMV on later versions. Requires AP 0.6.0 or later.

Game client available at: https://candybox2-ap.vicr123.com/20260210-1/
